attributes.action: Prosecute Bankers responsible for UK Credit Crunch
attributes.additional_details:
Prosecute Bankers responsible for the UK Credit Crunch.

Successful prosecutions to result in:

1.  Confiscation and liquidation of all of the bankers assets. These assets when liquidated to be  distributed to the UK electorate.

2. A minimum 5 year custodial prison sentences - not in an "Open" prison - and with application for parole denied for 4 years of their 5 years custodial sentence

3. Inclusion on a register of financial mismanagement which includes details of their familial relationship to UK members of Parliament and the UK "Aristocracy" past and present.

4. A lifetime ban from working in any capacity in the Banking industry
